      • removeCharamSuffix

        public java.util.Vector<StemmerRuleResult> removeCharamSuffix(java.lang.String token,
                                                     java.lang.String category)
        This function is used to remove type 3 suffixes i.e. charam suffixes. Internal working is quite same as function applySRRs. Only difference is that no recursion is required.
        Parameters:
        token - The token which is to be stemmed
        category - The category whose suffixes have to be considered
        Returns:
        A Vector of StemmeerRuleResult is returned depending upon the matches found in the lexicon

      • applySRRs

        public java.util.Vector<StemmerRuleResult> applySRRs(java.lang.String token,
                                            java.lang.String category)
        This function applies all possible suffix replacement rules on the given token.
        Parameters:
        token - The token on which rules are to be applied
        category - The category which has to be considered for stemming
        Returns:
        A Vector of results obtained on application of all possible rules.

      • applySpecialCharacterRulesOn

        public StemmerRuleResult applySpecialCharacterRulesOn(java.lang.String token)
        This function is used to check if the word is a special character like number or punctuation mark
        Parameters:
        token - The token which is to be stemmed
        Returns:
        A StemmerRuleResult is returned with appropriate type identified

      • checkForNounSuffixes

        public java.util.Vector<StemmerRuleResult> checkForNounSuffixes(java.lang.String token)
        This function is used to check whether input word ends with any of the noun suffixes
        Parameters:
        token - The token which is to be checked
        Returns:
        A Vector of StemmeerRuleResult is returned depending upon whether the suffixes are found and removed
